s.text: USA Today leads with word that the unseasonably warm weather much of the country is experiencing has been bad for seasonal businesses like ski tourism and for winter-related commodities like heating oil.
The Washington Post off-lead adds that the warm spell has hurt November retail sales, primarily because shelves are stocked with winter gear.
